problem: 如图,点D是△ABC外接圆圆弧AC上的点,AB=AC且∠CAB=50°,则∠ADC度数为()
answer: ∵AB=AC,∴∠ABC=∠ACB,∵∠BAC+∠ABC+∠ACB=180°,且∠CAB=50°,∴∠ABC=\frac{180^{°}-∠CAB}{2}=\frac{180^{°}-50^{°}}{2}=65^{°}∵四边形ADCB是⊙O的内接四边形,∴∠D+∠ABC=180°,∴∠ADC=115°故选D.
comment: 本题考查了等腰三角形的性质和三角形内角和定理以及圆周角定理,掌握圆内接四边形的对角互补是解题的关键.
problem_en: As shown in the figure, point D is the point on the arc AC circumscribed by △ABC, AB = AC and ∠CAB = N_0, then the degree of ∠ADC is ()
